testcase.name: Creation of Campaign
testcase.system-out: Given user launch the salesforce application................................passed Given user able to login....................................................passed When user created the new campaign under Campaigns page.....................passed Then the new campaign should created successfully...........................passed And logout the Application..................................................passed

testcase.name: Updation of Campaign
testcase.system-out: Given user launch the salesforce application................................passed Given user able to login....................................................passed When the user has a existing campaign.......................................passed When their is a need to update few fields details...........................passed Then user has option to update the details for existing campaign............passed

testcase.name: Deletion of Campaign
testcase.system-out: Given user launch the salesforce application................................passed Given user able to login....................................................passed When the user has a existing campaign.......................................passed When there is a need to delete any of the existing campaign.................passed Then user has option to delete the campaign successfully....................passed
